title: Yankee-kun na Yamada-kun to Megane-chan to Majo
alternative_title: Megane-chan to 7-nin no Majo, Megane-chan to Nananin no Majo, ヤンキー君な山田くんとメガネちゃんと魔女
description: The official website for the Yamada-kun and the Seven Witches television anime series revealed on Sunday that the anime's first Blu-ray Disc and DVD box sets will include a Yankee-kun to Megane-chan collaborative manga and anime.
